name: Light Variant
description:
Enable light window decorations on applications. This extension is not compatible with applications that use Client Side Decorations (CSD).

This extension depends on some Xorg utilities. To install them:
- Debian/Ubuntu: apt install x11-utils
- Fedora/RHEL: dnf install xorg-x11-utils
- Arch: pacman -S xorg-xprop

*Settings are provided to enable/disable applications.
